messages.title: YEAR FOR CHANGE
messages.content: We've now had thirteen years of this government and I believe that it's time for a change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We Conservatives have set out our plans for the elderly. We will protect the winter fuel allowance, protect free TV licences and bus passes, and most importantly, we will improve the state pension by re-linking it to earnings.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Help for Business, Help for Jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: In the current economic climate, it is vitally important that the government helps businesses to create new jobs, and helps unemployed people back into work.
Education sets children up with the skills and abilities they will need to succeed in the working world.
Regardless of their views on the European Union, many people feel let down that they did not get to have their say on the Lisbon Treaty, through a referendum.

issues.brexitEurope: Regardless of their views on the European Union, many people feel let down that they did not get to have their say on the Lisbon Treaty, through a referendum.
issues.economy: It is vitally important that the government helps businesses to create new jobs, and helps unemployed people back into work.
issues.education: Education sets children up with the skills and abilities they will need to succeed in the working world.
issues.socialWelfare: We will protect the winter fuel allowance, protect free TV licences and bus passes, and we will improve the state pension by re-linking it to earnings.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am delighted to have been chosen to stand as the Conservative candidate for the people of Dundee West at this Parliamentary election.

politicalExperience.role: Chairman of Dundee & South Angus Conservatives
Member of the party's Scottish Council
Served on the executive of the Stobswell Forum and Charleston Tenants Association
Trustee of the Baxter Park and Eastern Cemetery Trust
Trustee of the Dundee Museums Trust

contactInformation.address: Dundee & South Angus Conservatives, 8 Liones Road, Dundee, DD3 6AP

endorsements.endorsement: I have watched Colin with interest for many years and have genuinely been impressed with all the hard work he does within the local community of Dundee.

quotes.text: I believe Colin would make an excellent MP for Dundee West.

images.caption: Colin Stewart, Conservative candidate for Dundee West
